reg_pit.acttitle: British Columbia Transit Act; Motor Fuel Tax Act
reg_pit.title: Victoria Regional Transit Commission Regulation No. 39-2018

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 240/2019, effective November 27, 2019.

reg:regulation.reg:title: Victoria Regional Transit Commission Regulation No. 39-2018

bcl:section.bcl:text: In this regulation, land and improvements does not include land and improvements that are taxable for school purposes only by special Act.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 15 (2) (b) of the British Columbia Transit Act, prescribed tax rates for the fiscal year starting April 1, 2018 are

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: $0.1816 per $1 000 of the net taxable value of land and improvements of property in classes 1, 3, 8 and 9, and
$0.8808 per $1 000 of the net taxable value of land and improvements of property in classes 2, 4, 5, 6 and 7.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The references to classes of property in subsection (1) are to the classes of property under the Prescribed Classes of Property Regulation.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: British Columbia Transit Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 38, s. 15Â (2)]
